lines.gurmukhi: cItI kY audr ibKY hsqI smwie kYsy Aqul phwr Bwr BiRMgIn auTwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Cheetee Kai Udar Bikhai Hasatee Samaai Kaisay , Atul Pahaar Bhaar Bhringeen Outthaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As an elephant cannot be contained in the stomach of an ant, as a small flying insect cannot lift the weight of a mountain,

lines.gurmukhi: mwCr kY fMg n mrq hY bisq nwgu mkrI n cIqY jIqY sir n pUjwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Maachhar Kai Dang N Marat Hai Basit Naagu , Makaree N Cheetai Jeetai Sari N Poojaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a mosquito sting cannot kill the king of snakes, a spider can neither win a tiger nor match with it,

lines.gurmukhi: qmcr aufq n phUcY Awkws bws mUsw qau n pYrq smuMdR pwr pwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Tamachar Udat N Pahoochai Aakaas Baasa , Moosaa Tau N Pairat Samoundr Paar Paavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As an owl cannot fly and reach the sky, nor can a rat swim across the ocean and reach the far side,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy piRA pRym nym Agm AgwiD boiD gurmuiK swgr ijau bUMd huie smwveI ]75]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Pria Praym Naym Agam Agaadhi Bodhi , Gurmukhi Saagar Jiu Boond Hui Samaavaee ?75?

Shabad OS B.translation: So are the ethics of love of our beloved Lord difficult and beyond for us to understand. It is a very serious subject. As a drop of water merges with the water of the ocean, so does a devoted Sikh of the Guru becomes one with his beloved Lord. (75)
